description.value: This CapabilityStatement describes the minimal requirements for a client to send eOverdacht documents based on the Dutch Health and Care Information models (Dutch: Zorginformatiebouwsteen or ZIB), release 2017. The eOverdracht project is divided in multiple phases. This CapabilityStatement describes the minimal capabilities to comply to phase 1.
